items.sentence: Tom says that he forgot that he'd promised to do that.
The book that I wanted was at the bottom of the stack.
Tom wished that there were more trees on his property.
Tom was the one who taught Mary how to play solitaire.
Tom went back inside, but I didn't see the door close.
World War II was five times bloodier than World War I.
I'm not going to blame others for my mistakes anymore.
I'm afraid that we won't be able to help you tomorrow.
There were many women in the crowd with crying babies.
Tom broke his leg last year and has limped ever since.
